attributes.action: make a stand and deselect all Labour MP's that have taken advantage of expenses and call an election in the Summer of 2009.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The House must be cleared of all MP's who have lost credibility in regard to the Expenses Scandal.

rejection.details: As a Government website, we cannot host any party political material, such as reference to the Labour Party. This is explained in our terms and conditions: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms If you wish a political party to take a particular action, you should contact that party or one of its MPs directly.
